questions.quote: One of those fabric wholesalers. This guy Todd Gack. I won a bet from him.
Well, I have an idea. Keep the van, and get a bumper sticker that says, 'If this vans a-rockin', don't come a-knockin'.'
I love that bathroom. It's got that high, high toilet. I feel like a gargoyle perched on the ledge of a building.
Ooh. Well, this is uh, risky business, huh? I'm all a-twitter.
Well they don't. If they could drive, they wouldn't be handicapped.
Am I happy Beth left me? Of course not. Do I hope to pick up the pieces and move on? Absolutely
[to himself] Hey, whatd'ya know? Look at that! A *lesbian* sighting. Oh-ho! My lucky day. They're *so* fascinating. Why is that? Because they don't want us. You gotta respect that...
Your father's absolutely right. We're sitting there like idiots drinking coffee without a piece of cake!
All right. Now, what do I have to do to put you two in a relationship today?
Religion, my friend, that's what happened to me. Because, I have just been informed that it's going to cost Elaine the sum of five thousand dollars to get the apartment upstairs.
